content:
I'd be happy to help you calculate the average monthly cost of Max's supplies.

To do this, I'll need some information from you. Can you please provide the following:

1. A list of the supplies you purchase for Max (e.g., food, toys, vet bills, grooming, etc.)
2. The cost of each supply item
3. The frequency at which you purchase each supply item (e.g., weekly, bi-weekly, monthly, quarterly, annually)
4. The duration of time you've been tracking expenses (e.g., 3 months, 6 months, 1 year)

Once I have this information, I can help you calculate the average monthly cost of Max's supplies.
